amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 108-69 to require the Energy Department to develop a plan for the transfer of the Western New York Service Center in West Valley, New York, to the federal government, and requiring that the plan be transmitted to Congress by December 31, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reynolds amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Reynolds.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reynolds amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
